#include <iostream>
#include <queue>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

int vis[102];
ll d,n,x[102],y[102],z[102];

inline ll Scan_f()
{
    ll noRead=0;
    register char p=getchar_unlocked();
    //register char p=getc(stdin);
    for(;p<48 || p>57;p=getchar_unlocked());
    //for(;p<48 || p>57;p=getc(stdin));
    while(p>47 && p<58){ noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');p=getchar_unlocked();}
    //while(p>47 && p<58){ noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');p=getc(stdin);}
    return noRead;
};

void dfs(int u)
{
    int i;
    ll dt;
    vis[u] = 1;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        dt = (x[i]-x[u])*(x[i]-x[u])+(y[i]-y[u])*(y[i]-y[u])+(z[i]-z[u])*(z[i]-z[u]);
        if(vis[i] == 0 && dt <= d*d)
            dfs(i);
    }
}

int main()
{
    ll T,i,sol;
    T = Scan_f();
    while(T > 0)
    {
        n = Scan_f();
        d = Scan_f();
        sol = 0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&x[i],&y[i],&z[i]);
        }
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            vis[i] = 0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(vis[i] == 0)
            {
                sol++;
                dfs(i);
            }
        }
        printf("%lld\n",sol);
        T--;
    }
    return 0;
}
